verbose_text: In our mouse pup model of OIR, immunohistochemical analysis indicated that the expression levels of CCN1, p-PI3K and p-AKT in the neovascular tufts of the retinas and retinal angiogenesis were prevented by an intravitreal injection of CCN1 siRNA.
evidence: levels of CCN1, p-PI3K and p-AKT
